reviewText: Don't you just love it when you find the story interesting, but have to buy the others to complete that story?
Title: Avatar The Last Airbender - Book 2 Earth, Vol. 3

reviewText: My wife and I loved watching this series with our 17 year old daughter.  Ya it's kind of campy and corny in spots, but the characters are very engaging and I really like the moral lessons.I strongly recommend watching the series in order as they build off of each other.I heard that they were going to make a live action movie based on this.  I hope it happens!
summary: Great to watch with my daughter.
Title: Avatar The Last Airbender - Book 2 Earth, Vol. 3

reviewText: The episodes are fantastic, but this DVD did NOT come with the third part of the comic as advertised... did anyone else have that issue with their DVDs? The first and second DVD of Season 2 came with the mini-comics, but not this one...
Title: Avatar The Last Airbender - Book 2 Earth, Vol. 3

reviewText: still waiting for the entire second book to come out together, i'm sure it would be a better buy with bonus features, extras, ect.:)
Title: Avatar The Last Airbender - Book 2 Earth, Vol. 3

reviewText: My son loves this collection. This is only one of the movies in the collection, but he has the whole set thanks to Amazon The movies are quite entertaining.
Title: Avatar The Last Airbender - Book 2 Earth, Vol. 3

reviewText: Now, originally I was going to rate this only 1 star, but then I figured I go down in history as the guy who rated Avatar anything below 4 stars.  Don't get me wrong, I love the show.  It has action, plot, comedy and romance (though I'm not so big on the last one.)  It even has the unique quality of realism to it, by what I mean is that it follows the set of ground rules that was originally placed there.  Plus, the bad guys get a victory every now and then.The reason I was tempted to rate it 1 star was simply because I hate how they keep coming out with these individual DVDs.  By the time Book 2 finally comes out on DVD as a set, the 3rd book will probably be half way through.  I say ignore these individual volumes and go for the whole enchilada at the end.  Still, until people stop buying them, we're just going to have to put up with these individual volumes for a little while longer.
Title: Avatar The Last Airbender - Book 2 Earth, Vol. 3

reviewText: This is One of the Best PG Anime series Ever. My daugher, who is a senior, was very upset when I gave away this set to my neices and nephews. She is now demanding that I buy her a new set. You cannot go wrong with this product. It is good for the young and old alike.
summary: The Best PG Anime Series Ever
Title: Avatar The Last Airbender - Book 2 Earth, Vol. 3
